Pre-Game Insights: The Miami Heat (2-2, sixth in the Eastern Conference) will face the Washington Wizards (2-2, eighth in the Eastern Conference) in Mexico City.
Others: The BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE for the game is Heat -7; over/under is 226.5.
The Wizards finished 15-67 overall, 4-12 in Southeast Division action and 7-34 at home a season ago. The Heat finished 46-36 overall and 13-3 in Southeast Division action during the 2023-24 season.
Injuries: Wizards: Saddiq Bey: out (knee), Malcolm Brogdon: out (thumb), Kyle Kuzma: out (groin). Heat: Duncan Robinson: out (personal), Kevin Love: out (personal), Josh Richardson: day to day (calf)
